root.name: Popeye no Eigo Asobi
root.description: OverviewPopeye no Eigo Asobi is an educational game released only in Japan on the Famicom. Popeye no Eigo Asobi is a hangman style game which is supposed to help teach English.Most of its assets were taken from the Nintendo arcade game Popeye, the home version of which was one of the Famicom launch titles along with Donkey Kong and Donkey Kong Jr. Popeye no Eigo Asobi is the linguistic counterpart to Donkey Kong Jr. Math and was the seventh game released on the console overall.
